title: European-based Elin Energy builds new solar panel factory in Texas - BIC Magazine
summary: Elin Energy, a Turkish solar panel manufacturer, is opening a new factory in Waller County, Texas. The 200,000-square-foot facility will create about 100 jobs and produce high-quality solar panels using advanced technology. Elin Energy's commitment to sustainability is reflected in its focus on clean energy solutions and reducing carbon footprints.

title: Malaysia Data Center Market Report 2023: A $2.9 Billion Market by 2028 -Competition, Forecast & Opportunities ... - GlobeNewswire
summary: Malaysia's data center market is booming, driven by rising data consumption, the country's rapid digital transformation, and government initiatives to promote renewable energy. Major companies are investing in data centers in Malaysia, attracted by the cost advantages, skilled workforce, and pro-business policies. The increasing demand for cloud services and the adoption of digital technologies are further fueling this growth.
